msItem.title: I. Dǝrsanä sänbätä krǝstiyan “Homily on the Sabbath of Christians” (Homily on the observance of Sunday, ascribed to Jaqob of Serug)
msItem.incipit: Fol. 3ra: በስመ፡ʼʼ… ድርሳን፡ ዘደረሰ፤ አባ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ዘስሩግ፡ በእንተ፡ ዕበያ፡ ለሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን። ጸሎታ፡ ወበረከታ፤ የሃሉ፡ ምስለ፡ ገብሩ፤ [vac.] ለዓ፡ዓ፤ ወምስለ፡ ኵልነ፡ ስማዕያነ፡ ወድሶታ፡ ለሰንበተ፡ ክርስቲያን፡ ለዓለመ፤ ዓለም፤ አሜን፨ ስምዑ፡ ኦፍቁራ[fol. 3rb]ንየ፡ ውሉደ፡ ቤተ፡ ክርስቲያን…Fol. 3ra: In the name of the Father and the Son and the Holy Spirit, one God. (This is) the homily which ʾabba Jaqob of Serug composed on the greatness of the Sabbath of Christians. May her prayer and her blessing be with his servant … forever and ever, and with all of us, listeners of the praise of the Sabbath of Christians. Forever and ever. Amen. Listen, my beloved ones, sons of the church...
msItem.explicit: Fol. 24va, l.9: … በጸሎታ፡ ለቅድስት: ማርያም፡ ወላዲተ፡ አምላክ። ወዮሐንስ: መጥምቅ: ወጊዮርጊስ፡ ኃያል፡ ገባሬ: ኃይል፡ ዓቢይ: ሰማዕት፡ ወእስጢፋኖስ: ቅዳሜ: ሰማዕት: አንከረጠስ[፡] ወኵሎሙ፡ ቅዱሳን፡ ወሰማዕት። እለ: አስ[fol. 24vb]መርዎ: ለእግዚአብሔር: በመዋዕለ: ሕይወትሙ[sic]: [vac.] ለዓለ: ዓለም: አሜን::Fol. 24va, l.9: ... in the prayer of St. Mary, mother of God, and of John the Baptist and George, the strong miracle maker, great martyr, and of Stephen, first martyr, well anchored, and of all the saints and martyrs who pleased God during their life ... Forever and ever. Amen.

supportDesc.condition: The leaher cover on the spine and back cover is missing; the sewing is damaged, crudely repared with modern threads. Many leaves are damaged by rodents (esp. fols. 18r-25v). Stains on the bottom corner of some leaves making some parts of the text difficult to read (esp. fols. 5v-10v, 13r-15r). Cut carefully amended on fol. 11. Hole on fol. 13.
